meanings.definition: A group of three people or things.
meanings.sent1: They formed a terzetto to work on the project together.
meanings.sent2: The terzetto of friends went on a hike in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The terzetto of kittens played joyfully in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The terzetto of colors in the painting created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The terzetto of stars shone brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A musical composition for three voices or instruments.
meanings.sent1: The musicians performed a beautiful terzetto at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The terzetto for violin, cello, and piano was well-received by the audience.
meanings.sent3: The terzetto of birds outside the window sang a melodious tune.
meanings.sent4: The terzetto of instruments in the orchestra created a symphonic masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The terzetto of voices blended seamlessly in the choral performance.
